Source code for gui.tkinter_app

from __future__ import annotations

import sys
import pathlib
from dataclasses import dataclass

ROOT = pathlib.Path(__file__).resolve().parents[2]
sys.path.insert(0, str(ROOT))

import tkinter as tk
from tkinter import ttk, messagebox, filedialog
from tkinter import font as tkfont

PRIMARY = '#7b002c'
PRIMARY_DARK = '#5a001f'
PRIMARY_LIGHT = '#b34c73'
SURFACE = '#ffffff'
BG = '#fbf8f7'
STRIPE = '#f4eaee'
SELECT_BG = '#ead6df'
TEXT = '#222222'

from src.models import Student, Instructor, Course
from src.persistence.json_store import save_to_json, load_from_json
from src.validation.validators import (
    is_valid_person_name,
    is_non_negative_int,
    is_valid_email,
    is_valid_student_id,
    is_valid_instructor_id,
    is_valid_course_id,
    is_valid_course_name,
    norm_name,
    norm_email,
    norm_id,
)




[docs]
@dataclass
class Store:
    students: dict[str, Student]
    instructors: dict[str, Instructor]
    courses: dict[str, Course]



[docs]
    @classmethod
    def empty(cls) -> "Store":
        return cls({}, {}, {})








[docs]
class App(tk.Tk):
    def __init__(self) -> None:
        super().__init__()
        self.title("School Management System")
        self.geometry("1100x720")
        self.minsize(960, 640)
        try:
            self.tk.call('tk', 'scaling', 1.2)
        except Exception:
            pass
        self._setup_theme()
        self.store: Store = Store.empty()
        self.logo_img = self._load_logo()
        self._build_ui()
        self._refresh_all_views()

    def _setup_theme(self) -> None:
        style = ttk.Style(self)
        try:
            style.theme_use('clam')
        except Exception:
            pass
        default_font = tkfont.nametofont('TkDefaultFont')
        default_font.configure(family='Segoe UI', size=10)
        tree_font = tkfont.Font(family='Segoe UI', size=10)
        heading_font = tkfont.Font(family='Segoe UI', size=11, weight='bold')
        self.configure(bg=BG)
        style.configure('TFrame', background=BG)
        style.configure('TLabelframe', background=BG)
        style.configure('TLabelframe.Label', background=BG, foreground=PRIMARY)
        style.configure('TLabel', background=BG, foreground=TEXT)
        style.configure('TNotebook', background=BG, borderwidth=0)
        style.configure('TNotebook.Tab', padding=(14, 8), font=('Segoe UI', 11))
        style.map('TNotebook.Tab', background=[('selected', SURFACE)], foreground=[('selected', PRIMARY)])
        style.configure('TButton', padding=6)
        style.configure('Accent.TButton', background=PRIMARY, foreground='white')
        style.map('Accent.TButton', background=[('active', PRIMARY_DARK), ('pressed', PRIMARY_DARK)])
        style.configure('Treeview', background=SURFACE, fieldbackground=SURFACE, foreground=TEXT,
                        rowheight=26, font=tree_font, bordercolor=PRIMARY_LIGHT, borderwidth=0)
        style.map('Treeview', background=[('selected', SELECT_BG)])
        style.configure('Treeview.Heading', font=heading_font, background=PRIMARY, foreground='white')
        style.map('Treeview.Heading', background=[('active', PRIMARY_DARK)])

    def _load_logo(self):
        for rel in ('logo.png', 'data/logo.png', 'assets/logo.png', 'resources/logo.png'):
            p = ROOT / rel
            if p.exists():
                try:
                    img = tk.PhotoImage(file=str(p))
                    if img.width() > 380:
                        factor = max(1, img.width() // 380)
                        img = img.subsample(factor, factor)
                    return img
                except Exception:
                    pass
        return None

    def _add_header(self, parent: tk.Widget, title: str) -> None:
        bar = ttk.Frame(parent)
        bar.grid(row=0, column=0, columnspan=8, sticky='ew', padx=10, pady=(8, 2))
        bar.columnconfigure(1, weight=1)
        if self.logo_img is not None:
            ttk.Label(bar, image=self.logo_img, background=BG).grid(row=0, column=0, sticky='w')
        lbl = ttk.Label(bar, text=title, font=('Segoe UI Semibold', 16), foreground=PRIMARY, background=BG)
        lbl.grid(row=0, column=1, sticky='w', padx=10)

    def _build_ui(self) -> None:
        self.columnconfigure(0, weight=1)
        self.rowconfigure(0, weight=1)
        nb = ttk.Notebook(self)
        nb.grid(row=0, column=0, sticky="nsew")
        self.tab_students = ttk.Frame(nb)
        self.tab_instructors = ttk.Frame(nb)
        self.tab_courses = ttk.Frame(nb)
        self.tab_relations = ttk.Frame(nb)
        self.tab_records = ttk.Frame(nb)
        self.tab_io = ttk.Frame(nb)
        nb.add(self.tab_students, text="Students")
        nb.add(self.tab_instructors, text="Instructors")
        nb.add(self.tab_courses, text="Courses")
        nb.add(self.tab_relations, text="Register / Assign")
        nb.add(self.tab_records, text="Records & Search")
        nb.add(self.tab_io, text="Save / Load")
        self._build_students_tab()
        self._build_instructors_tab()
        self._build_courses_tab()
        self._build_relations_tab()
        self._build_records_tab()
        self._build_io_tab()

    def _error(self, msg: str) -> None:
        messagebox.showerror("Error", msg, parent=self)

    def _info(self, msg: str) -> None:
        messagebox.showinfo("Info", msg, parent=self)

    def _confirm(self, msg: str) -> bool:
        return messagebox.askyesno("Confirm", msg, parent=self)

    def _refresh_all_views(self) -> None:
        self._refresh_student_tree()
        self._refresh_instructor_tree()
        self._refresh_course_tree()
        self._refresh_relation_inputs()
        self._refresh_records_trees()

    def _build_students_tab(self) -> None:
        f = self.tab_students
        for i in range(4):
            f.columnconfigure(i, weight=1)
        f.rowconfigure(3, weight=1)
        self._add_header(f, "Students")
        frm = ttk.LabelFrame(f, text="Add / Edit Student")
        frm.grid(row=1, column=0, columnspan=4, sticky="ew", padx=10, pady=10, ipady=5)
        for i in range(8):
            frm.columnconfigure(i, weight=1)
        ttk.Label(frm, text="Student ID").grid(row=0, column=0, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="e")
        self.ent_sid = ttk.Entry(frm)
        self.ent_sid.grid(row=0, column=1, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="ew")
        ttk.Label(frm, text="Name").grid(row=0, column=2, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="e")
        self.ent_sname = ttk.Entry(frm)
        self.ent_sname.grid(row=0, column=3, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="ew")
        ttk.Label(frm, text="Age").grid(row=0, column=4, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="e")
        self.ent_sage = ttk.Entry(frm)
        self.ent_sage.grid(row=0, column=5, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="ew")
        ttk.Label(frm, text="Email").grid(row=0, column=6, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="e")
        self.ent_semail = ttk.Entry(frm)
        self.ent_semail.grid(row=0, column=7, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="ew")
        self.btn_add_student = ttk.Button(frm, text="Add / Update", style='Accent.TButton', command=self._on_add_or_update_student)
        self.btn_add_student.grid(row=1, column=0, columnspan=2, padx=6, pady=8, sticky="ew")
        self.btn_delete_student = ttk.Button(frm, text="Delete Selected", command=self._on_delete_selected_student)
        self.btn_delete_student.grid(row=1, column=2, columnspan=2, padx=6, pady=8, sticky="ew")
        self.btn_clear_student = ttk.Button(frm, text="Clear Form", command=self._clear_student_form)
        self.btn_clear_student.grid(row=1, column=4, columnspan=2, padx=6, pady=8, sticky="ew")
        tree = ttk.Treeview(f, columns=("id","name","age","email","courses"), show="headings", height=14, style='Treeview')
        tree.grid(row=3, column=0, columnspan=4, sticky="nsew", padx=10, pady=10)
        for c, w in zip(("id","name","age","email","courses"), (100, 200, 60, 220, 300)):
            tree.heading(c, text=c.capitalize())
            tree.column(c, width=w, stretch=True)
        ysb = ttk.Scrollbar(f, orient="vertical", command=tree.yview)
        tree.configure(yscrollcommand=ysb.set)
        ysb.grid(row=3, column=4, sticky="ns", pady=10)
        tree.bind("<<TreeviewSelect>>", self._on_select_student_row)
        self.tree_students = tree

    def _clear_student_form(self) -> None:
        self.ent_sid.delete(0, tk.END)
        self.ent_sname.delete(0, tk.END)
        self.ent_sage.delete(0, tk.END)
        self.ent_semail.delete(0, tk.END)
        self.tree_students.selection_remove(self.tree_students.selection())

    def _on_add_or_update_student(self) -> None:
        sid = self.ent_sid.get().strip()
        name = self.ent_sname.get().strip()
        age_s = self.ent_sage.get().strip()
        email = self.ent_semail.get().strip()
        if not is_valid_student_id(sid):
            return self._error("Invalid student ID.")
        if not is_valid_person_name(name):
            return self._error("Invalid name.")
        if not is_non_negative_int(age_s):
            return self._error("Age must be a non-negative integer.")
        if not is_valid_email(email):
            return self._error("Invalid email.")
        sid_n = norm_id(sid)
        name_n = norm_name(name)
        age = int(age_s)
        email_n = norm_email(email)
        if sid_n in self.store.students:
            s = self.store.students[sid_n]
            s.name = name_n
            s.age = age
            s.email = email_n
        else:
            self.store.students[sid_n] = Student(name_n, age, email_n, sid_n)
        self._refresh_student_tree()
        self._refresh_relation_inputs()
        self._info("Student saved.")

    def _on_delete_selected_student(self) -> None:
        sel = self.tree_students.selection()
        if not sel:
            return
        iid = sel[0]
        sid = self.tree_students.item(iid, "values")[0]
        if not self._confirm(f"Delete student {sid}? This will also remove them from courses."):
            return
        s = self.store.students.get(sid)
        if s:
            for c in list(s.registered_courses):
                s.unregister_course(c)
            del self.store.students[sid]
        self._refresh_all_views()

    def _on_select_student_row(self, _evt=None) -> None:
        sel = self.tree_students.selection()
        if not sel:
            return
        vals = self.tree_students.item(sel[0], "values")
        sid, name, age, email = vals[:4]
        self.ent_sid.delete(0, tk.END); self.ent_sid.insert(0, sid)
        self.ent_sname.delete(0, tk.END); self.ent_sname.insert(0, name)
        self.ent_sage.delete(0, tk.END); self.ent_sage.insert(0, age)
        self.ent_semail.delete(0, tk.END); self.ent_semail.insert(0, email)

    def _refresh_student_tree(self) -> None:
        t = self.tree_students
        for i in t.get_children():
            t.delete(i)
        t.tag_configure('odd', background=STRIPE)
        t.tag_configure('even', background=SURFACE)
        for idx, (sid, s) in enumerate(sorted(self.store.students.items())):
            courses = ", ".join(sorted(c.course_id for c in s.registered_courses))
            tag = 'odd' if idx % 2 else 'even'
            t.insert("", tk.END, values=(sid, s.name, s.age, s.email, courses), tags=(tag,))

    def _build_instructors_tab(self) -> None:
        f = self.tab_instructors
        for i in range(4): f.columnconfigure(i, weight=1)
        f.rowconfigure(3, weight=1)
        self._add_header(f, "Instructors")
        frm = ttk.LabelFrame(f, text="Add / Edit Instructor")
        frm.grid(row=1, column=0, columnspan=4, sticky="ew", padx=10, pady=10)
        for i in range(8): frm.columnconfigure(i, weight=1)
        ttk.Label(frm, text="Instructor ID").grid(row=0, column=0, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="e")
        self.ent_iid = ttk.Entry(frm)
        self.ent_iid.grid(row=0, column=1, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="ew")
        ttk.Label(frm, text="Name").grid(row=0, column=2, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="e")
        self.ent_iname = ttk.Entry(frm)
        self.ent_iname.grid(row=0, column=3, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="ew")
        ttk.Label(frm, text="Age").grid(row=0, column=4, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="e")
        self.ent_iage = ttk.Entry(frm)
        self.ent_iage.grid(row=0, column=5, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="ew")
        ttk.Label(frm, text="Email").grid(row=0, column=6, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="e")
        self.ent_iemail = ttk.Entry(frm)
        self.ent_iemail.grid(row=0, column=7, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="ew")
        ttk.Button(frm, text="Add / Update", style='Accent.TButton', command=self._on_add_or_update_instructor).grid(row=1, column=0, columnspan=2, padx=6, pady=8, sticky="ew")
        ttk.Button(frm, text="Delete Selected", command=self._on_delete_selected_instructor).grid(row=1, column=2, columnspan=2, padx=6, pady=8, sticky="ew")
        ttk.Button(frm, text="Clear Form", command=self._clear_instructor_form).grid(row=1, column=4, columnspan=2, padx=6, pady=8, sticky="ew")
        tree = ttk.Treeview(f, columns=("id","name","age","email","courses"), show="headings", height=14, style='Treeview')
        tree.grid(row=3, column=0, columnspan=4, sticky="nsew", padx=10, pady=10)
        for c, w in zip(("id","name","age","email","courses"), (110, 200, 60, 220, 300)):
            tree.heading(c, text=c.capitalize())
            tree.column(c, width=w, stretch=True)
        ysb = ttk.Scrollbar(f, orient="vertical", command=tree.yview)
        tree.configure(yscrollcommand=ysb.set)
        ysb.grid(row=3, column=4, sticky="ns", pady=10)
        tree.bind("<<TreeviewSelect>>", self._on_select_instructor_row)
        self.tree_instructors = tree

    def _clear_instructor_form(self) -> None:
        self.ent_iid.delete(0, tk.END)
        self.ent_iname.delete(0, tk.END)
        self.ent_iage.delete(0, tk.END)
        self.ent_iemail.delete(0, tk.END)
        self.tree_instructors.selection_remove(self.tree_instructors.selection())

    def _on_add_or_update_instructor(self) -> None:
        iid = self.ent_iid.get().strip()
        name = self.ent_iname.get().strip()
        age_s = self.ent_iage.get().strip()
        email = self.ent_iemail.get().strip()
        if not is_valid_instructor_id(iid):
            return self._error("Invalid instructor ID.")
        if not is_valid_person_name(name):
            return self._error("Invalid name.")
        if not is_non_negative_int(age_s):
            return self._error("Age must be a non-negative integer.")
        if not is_valid_email(email):
            return self._error("Invalid email.")
        iid_n = norm_id(iid)
        name_n = norm_name(name)
        age = int(age_s)
        email_n = norm_email(email)
        if iid_n in self.store.instructors:
            i = self.store.instructors[iid_n]
            i.name = name_n
            i.age = age
            i.email = email_n
        else:
            self.store.instructors[iid_n] = Instructor(name_n, age, email_n, iid_n)
        self._refresh_instructor_tree()
        self._refresh_relation_inputs()
        self._info("Instructor saved.")

    def _on_delete_selected_instructor(self) -> None:
        sel = self.tree_instructors.selection()
        if not sel:
            return
        iid = self.tree_instructors.item(sel[0], "values")[0]
        if not self._confirm(f"Delete instructor {iid}? This will unassign their courses."):
            return
        ins = self.store.instructors.get(iid)
        if ins:
            for c in list(ins.assigned_courses):
                c.set_instructor(None)
            del self.store.instructors[iid]
        self._refresh_all_views()

    def _on_select_instructor_row(self, _evt=None) -> None:
        sel = self.tree_instructors.selection()
        if not sel:
            return
        vals = self.tree_instructors.item(sel[0], "values")
        iid, name, age, email = vals[:4]
        self.ent_iid.delete(0, tk.END); self.ent_iid.insert(0, iid)
        self.ent_iname.delete(0, tk.END); self.ent_iname.insert(0, name)
        self.ent_iage.delete(0, tk.END); self.ent_iage.insert(0, age)
        self.ent_iemail.delete(0, tk.END); self.ent_iemail.insert(0, email)

    def _refresh_instructor_tree(self) -> None:
        t = self.tree_instructors
        for i in t.get_children():
            t.delete(i)
        t.tag_configure('odd', background=STRIPE)
        t.tag_configure('even', background=SURFACE)
        for idx, (iid, ins) in enumerate(sorted(self.store.instructors.items())):
            courses = ", ".join(sorted(c.course_id for c in ins.assigned_courses))
            tag = 'odd' if idx % 2 else 'even'
            t.insert("", tk.END, values=(iid, ins.name, ins.age, ins.email, courses), tags=(tag,))

    def _build_courses_tab(self) -> None:
        f = self.tab_courses
        for i in range(4): f.columnconfigure(i, weight=1)
        f.rowconfigure(3, weight=1)
        self._add_header(f, "Courses")
        frm = ttk.LabelFrame(f, text="Add / Edit Course")
        frm.grid(row=1, column=0, columnspan=4, sticky="ew", padx=10, pady=10)
        for i in range(6): frm.columnconfigure(i, weight=1)
        ttk.Label(frm, text="Course ID").grid(row=0, column=0, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="e")
        self.ent_cid = ttk.Entry(frm)
        self.ent_cid.grid(row=0, column=1, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="ew")
        ttk.Label(frm, text="Course Name").grid(row=0, column=2, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="e")
        self.ent_cname = ttk.Entry(frm)
        self.ent_cname.grid(row=0, column=3, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="ew")
        ttk.Button(frm, text="Add / Update", style='Accent.TButton', command=self._on_add_or_update_course).grid(row=1, column=0, columnspan=2, padx=6, pady=8, sticky="ew")
        ttk.Button(frm, text="Delete Selected", command=self._on_delete_selected_course).grid(row=1, column=2, columnspan=2, padx=6, pady=8, sticky="ew")
        ttk.Button(frm, text="Clear Form", command=self._clear_course_form).grid(row=1, column=4, padx=6, pady=8, sticky="ew")
        tree = ttk.Treeview(f, columns=("id","name","instructor","students"), show="headings", height=14, style='Treeview')
        tree.grid(row=3, column=0, columnspan=4, sticky="nsew", padx=10, pady=10)
        for c, w in zip(("id","name","instructor","students"), (110, 260, 180, 360)):
            tree.heading(c, text=c.capitalize())
            tree.column(c, width=w, stretch=True)
        ysb = ttk.Scrollbar(f, orient="vertical", command=tree.yview)
        tree.configure(yscrollcommand=ysb.set)
        ysb.grid(row=3, column=4, sticky="ns", pady=10)
        tree.bind("<<TreeviewSelect>>", self._on_select_course_row)
        self.tree_courses = tree

    def _clear_course_form(self) -> None:
        self.ent_cid.delete(0, tk.END)
        self.ent_cname.delete(0, tk.END)
        self.tree_courses.selection_remove(self.tree_courses.selection())

    def _on_add_or_update_course(self) -> None:
        cid = self.ent_cid.get().strip()
        cname = self.ent_cname.get().strip()
        if not is_valid_course_id(cid):
            return self._error("Invalid course ID (e.g., EECE435 or MATH201A).")
        if not is_valid_course_name(cname):
            return self._error("Invalid course name (3-60 chars).")
        cid_n = norm_id(cid)
        cname_n = norm_name(cname)
        if cid_n in self.store.courses:
            c = self.store.courses[cid_n]
            c.course_name = cname_n
        else:
            self.store.courses[cid_n] = Course(cid_n, cname_n)
        self._refresh_course_tree()
        self._refresh_relation_inputs()
        self._info("Course saved.")

    def _on_delete_selected_course(self) -> None:
        sel = self.tree_courses.selection()
        if not sel:
            return
        cid = self.tree_courses.item(sel[0], "values")[0]
        if not self._confirm(f"Delete course {cid}? This will unlink students and instructor."):
            return
        c = self.store.courses.get(cid)
        if c:
            for s in list(c.enrolled_students):
                c.remove_student(s)
            if c.instructor is not None:
                c.set_instructor(None)
            del self.store.courses[cid]
        self._refresh_all_views()

    def _on_select_course_row(self, _evt=None) -> None:
        sel = self.tree_courses.selection()
        if not sel:
            return
        cid, cname, *_ = self.tree_courses.item(sel[0], "values")
        self.ent_cid.delete(0, tk.END); self.ent_cid.insert(0, cid)
        self.ent_cname.delete(0, tk.END); self.ent_cname.insert(0, cname)

    def _refresh_course_tree(self) -> None:
        t = self.tree_courses
        for i in t.get_children():
            t.delete(i)
        t.tag_configure('odd', background=STRIPE)
        t.tag_configure('even', background=SURFACE)
        for idx, (cid, c) in enumerate(sorted(self.store.courses.items())):
            instr = c.instructor.instructor_id if c.instructor else ""
            students = ", ".join(sorted(s.student_id for s in c.enrolled_students))
            tag = 'odd' if idx % 2 else 'even'
            t.insert("", tk.END, values=(cid, c.course_name, instr, students), tags=(tag,))

    def _build_relations_tab(self) -> None:
        f = self.tab_relations
        for i in range(4): f.columnconfigure(i, weight=1)
        for r in range(3): f.rowconfigure(r, weight=0)
        self._add_header(f, "Register & Assign")
        reg = ttk.LabelFrame(f, text="Register Student to Course")
        reg.grid(row=1, column=0, columnspan=4, sticky="ew", padx=10, pady=10)
        for i in range(6): reg.columnconfigure(i, weight=1)
        ttk.Label(reg, text="Student").grid(row=0, column=0, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="e")
        self.cb_reg_student = ttk.Combobox(reg, state="readonly", values=[])
        self.cb_reg_student.grid(row=0, column=1, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="ew")
        ttk.Label(reg, text="Course").grid(row=0, column=2, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="e")
        self.cb_reg_course = ttk.Combobox(reg, state="readonly", values=[])
        self.cb_reg_course.grid(row=0, column=3, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="ew")
        ttk.Button(reg, text="Register", style='Accent.TButton', command=self._on_register_student).grid(row=0, column=4, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="ew")
        asg = ttk.LabelFrame(f, text="Assign Instructor to Course")
        asg.grid(row=2, column=0, columnspan=4, sticky="ew", padx=10, pady=10)
        for i in range(6): asg.columnconfigure(i, weight=1)
        ttk.Label(asg, text="Instructor").grid(row=0, column=0, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="e")
        self.cb_asg_instructor = ttk.Combobox(asg, state="readonly", values=[])
        self.cb_asg_instructor.grid(row=0, column=1, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="ew")
        ttk.Label(asg, text="Course").grid(row=0, column=2, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="e")
        self.cb_asg_course = ttk.Combobox(asg, state="readonly", values=[])
        self.cb_asg_course.grid(row=0, column=3, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="ew")
        ttk.Button(asg, text="Assign", style='Accent.TButton', command=self._on_assign_instructor).grid(row=0, column=4, padx=6, pady=6, sticky="ew")

    def _refresh_relation_inputs(self) -> None:
        self.cb_reg_student["values"] = sorted(self.store.students.keys())
        self.cb_reg_course["values"] = sorted(self.store.courses.keys())
        self.cb_asg_instructor["values"] = sorted(self.store.instructors.keys())
        self.cb_asg_course["values"] = sorted(self.store.courses.keys())
        for cb in (self.cb_reg_student, self.cb_reg_course, self.cb_asg_instructor, self.cb_asg_course):
            cb.set("")

    def _on_register_student(self) -> None:
        sid = self.cb_reg_student.get().strip()
        cid = self.cb_reg_course.get().strip()
        if not sid or not cid:
            return self._error("Pick both a student and a course.")
        s = self.store.students.get(sid); c = self.store.courses.get(cid)
        if not s or not c:
            return self._error("Invalid selection.")
        c.add_student(s)
        self._refresh_student_tree(); self._refresh_course_tree(); self._info("Student registered.")

    def _on_assign_instructor(self) -> None:
        iid = self.cb_asg_instructor.get().strip()
        cid = self.cb_asg_course.get().strip()
        if not iid or not cid:
            return self._error("Pick both an instructor and a course.")
        i = self.store.instructors.get(iid); c = self.store.courses.get(cid)
        if not i or not c:
            return self._error("Invalid selection.")
        i.assign_course(c)
        self._refresh_instructor_tree(); self._refresh_course_tree(); self._info("Instructor assigned.")

    def _build_records_tab(self) -> None:
        f = self.tab_records
        for i in range(6): f.columnconfigure(i, weight=1)
        f.rowconfigure(2, weight=1)
        self._add_header(f, "Records & Search")
        ttk.Label(f, text="Search:").grid(row=1, column=0, padx=8, pady=10, sticky="e")
        self.ent_search = ttk.Entry(f)
        self.ent_search.grid(row=1, column=1, padx=8, pady=10, sticky="ew")
        self.cb_scope = ttk.Combobox(f, state="readonly", values=["Students","Instructors","Courses","All"], width=14)
        self.cb_scope.grid(row=1, column=2, padx=8, pady=10)
        self.cb_scope.set("All")
        ttk.Button(f, text="Apply", style='Accent.TButton', command=self._on_apply_search).grid(row=1, column=3, padx=8, pady=10)
        ttk.Button(f, text="Clear", command=self._on_clear_search).grid(row=1, column=4, padx=8, pady=10)
        self.rec_students = self._make_tree(f, ("id","name","age","email","courses"), widths=(110, 200, 60, 220, 260))
        self.rec_instructors = self._make_tree(f, ("id","name","age","email","courses"), widths=(110, 200, 60, 220, 260))
        self.rec_courses = self._make_tree(f, ("id","name","instructor","students"), widths=(120, 240, 160, 260))
        self.rec_students["frame"].grid(row=2, column=0, columnspan=2, sticky="nsew", padx=6, pady=6)
        self.rec_instructors["frame"].grid(row=2, column=2, columnspan=2, sticky="nsew", padx=6, pady=6)
        self.rec_courses["frame"].grid(row=2, column=4, columnspan=2, sticky="nsew", padx=6, pady=6)

    def _make_tree(self, parent, cols, widths):
        frame = ttk.Frame(parent)
        tree = ttk.Treeview(frame, columns=cols, show="headings", height=14, style='Treeview')
        for c, w in zip(cols, widths):
            tree.heading(c, text=c.capitalize())
            tree.column(c, width=w, stretch=True)
        ysb = ttk.Scrollbar(frame, orient="vertical", command=tree.yview)
        tree.configure(yscrollcommand=ysb.set)
        tree.grid(row=0, column=0, sticky="nsew")
        ysb.grid(row=0, column=1, sticky="ns")
        frame.columnconfigure(0, weight=1); frame.rowconfigure(0, weight=1)
        return {"frame": frame, "tree": tree}

    def _refresh_records_trees(self) -> None:
        self._fill_student_tree(self.rec_students["tree"], self.store.students.values())
        self._fill_instructor_tree(self.rec_instructors["tree"], self.store.instructors.values())
        self._fill_course_tree(self.rec_courses["tree"], self.store.courses.values())

    def _on_apply_search(self) -> None:
        q = self.ent_search.get().strip().lower()
        scope = self.cb_scope.get()

        def match_student(s: Student) -> bool:
            return (q in s.student_id.lower() or q in s.name.lower() or q in s.email.lower() or any(q in c.course_id.lower() for c in s.registered_courses))

        def match_instructor(i: Instructor) -> bool:
            return (q in i.instructor_id.lower() or q in i.name.lower() or q in i.email.lower() or any(q in c.course_id.lower() for c in i.assigned_courses))

        def match_course(c: Course) -> bool:
            return (q in c.course_id.lower() or q in c.course_name.lower() or (c.instructor and q in c.instructor.instructor_id.lower()) or any(q in s.student_id.lower() for s in c.enrolled_students))

        students = [s for s in self.store.students.values() if match_student(s)] if scope in ("Students","All") else (self.store.students.values() if scope != "Students" else [])
        instructors = [i for i in self.store.instructors.values() if match_instructor(i)] if scope in ("Instructors","All") else (self.store.instructors.values() if scope != "Instructors" else [])
        courses = [c for c in self.store.courses.values() if match_course(c)] if scope in ("Courses","All") else (self.store.courses.values() if scope != "Courses" else [])

        self._fill_student_tree(self.rec_students["tree"], students)
        self._fill_instructor_tree(self.rec_instructors["tree"], instructors)
        self._fill_course_tree(self.rec_courses["tree"], courses)

    def _on_clear_search(self) -> None:
        self.ent_search.delete(0, tk.END)
        self.cb_scope.set("All")
        self._refresh_records_trees()

    def _fill_student_tree(self, tree: ttk.Treeview, students) -> None:
        for i in tree.get_children(): tree.delete(i)
        tree.tag_configure('odd', background=STRIPE)
        tree.tag_configure('even', background=SURFACE)
        for idx, s in enumerate(sorted(students, key=lambda x: x.student_id)):
            courses = ", ".join(sorted(c.course_id for c in s.registered_courses))
            tag = 'odd' if idx % 2 else 'even'
            tree.insert("", tk.END, values=(s.student_id, s.name, s.age, s.email, courses), tags=(tag,))

    def _fill_instructor_tree(self, tree: ttk.Treeview, instructors) -> None:
        for i in tree.get_children(): tree.delete(i)
        tree.tag_configure('odd', background=STRIPE)
        tree.tag_configure('even', background=SURFACE)
        for idx, ins in enumerate(sorted(instructors, key=lambda x: x.instructor_id)):
            courses = ", ".join(sorted(c.course_id for c in ins.assigned_courses))
            tag = 'odd' if idx % 2 else 'even'
            tree.insert("", tk.END, values=(ins.instructor_id, ins.name, ins.age, ins.email, courses), tags=(tag,))

    def _fill_course_tree(self, tree: ttk.Treeview, courses) -> None:
        for i in tree.get_children(): tree.delete(i)
        tree.tag_configure('odd', background=STRIPE)
        tree.tag_configure('even', background=SURFACE)
        for idx, c in enumerate(sorted(courses, key=lambda x: x.course_id)):
            instr = c.instructor.instructor_id if c.instructor else ""
            students = ", ".join(sorted(s.student_id for s in c.enrolled_students))
            tag = 'odd' if idx % 2 else 'even'
            tree.insert("", tk.END, values=(c.course_id, c.course_name, instr, students), tags=(tag,))

    def _build_io_tab(self) -> None:
        f = self.tab_io
        for i in range(3): f.columnconfigure(i, weight=1)
        self._add_header(f, "Save / Load")
        ttk.Label(f, text="Save and Load your data as JSON using the existing persistence layer.").grid(row=1, column=0, columnspan=3, padx=12, pady=12)
        ttk.Button(f, text="Save", style='Accent.TButton', command=self._on_save).grid(row=2, column=0, padx=12, pady=12, sticky="ew")
        ttk.Button(f, text="Load", command=self._on_load).grid(row=2, column=1, padx=12, pady=12, sticky="ew")
        ttk.Button(f, text="Clear All (In-Memory)", command=self._on_clear_all).grid(row=2, column=2, padx=12, pady=12, sticky="ew")

    def _on_save(self) -> None:
        path = filedialog.asksaveasfilename(defaultextension=".json", filetypes=[("JSON","*.json"), ("All Files","*.*")])
        if not path:
            return
        try:
            save_to_json(path, self.store.students.values(), self.store.instructors.values(), self.store.courses.values())
            self._info("Saved successfully.")
        except Exception as e:
            self._error(f"Failed to save: {e}")

    def _on_load(self) -> None:
        path = filedialog.askopenfilename(filetypes=[("JSON","*.json"), ("All Files","*.*")])
        if not path:
            return
        try:
            students_by_id, instructors_by_id, courses_by_id = load_from_json(path)
            self.store = Store(students_by_id, instructors_by_id, courses_by_id)
            self._refresh_all_views()
            self._info("Loaded successfully.")
        except Exception as e:
            self._error(f"Failed to load: {e}")

    def _on_clear_all(self) -> None:
        if not self._confirm("Clear all in-memory data? This does not delete files."):
            return
        self.store = Store.empty()
        self._refresh_all_views()




if __name__ == "__main__":
    App().mainloop()
